description:
vessel_balticshipping

_____________________________________________ the package makes it easy to obtain vessel data from www.balticshipping.com in the form of dictionary based on the imo number. _____________________________________________

instructions.

to install the package, perform: ```python pip install data_foldersplit ``` how to use the methods:

1. to create the folder structure:

```python #importing library. import vessel_balticshipping as vs #imo number (use integer only) imo = 7814424 print(vs.vesseldata(imo) ``` _____________________________________________

have fun. :-)
keywords: ship data,imo,vessel data,vessel imo gross tonnage data
license: gnu affero general public license v3.0
name: vessel-balticshipping
summary: obtain ship/ vessel data based on imo number
